title: Chetan Bhagat shares a trivia about Shraddha Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor's 'Half Girlfriend' | Zee News
text:
Chetan Bhagat shares a trivia about Shraddha Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor's 'Half Girlfriend' By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 19:31 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Indian author Chetan Bhagat on Monday took to Twitter to share with his fans an interesting piece of trivia about the upcoming Bollywood release 'Half Girlfriend'. He revealed that the Mohit Suri directorial is one of the few films which have actually been shot at New Delhi's prestigious St Stephen's college. 
"Hi guys! #halfgirlfriend 12.5 weeks to go! Today's cool #filmfact: The St. Stephen's connection!" the 42-year-old writer tweeted. Hi guys! #halfgirlfriend 12.5 weeks to go! Today's cool #filmfact : The St. Stephen's connection! pic.twitter.com/aVyFUqSriR 
â€” Chetan Bhagat (@chetan_bhagat) February 20, 2017 
The film is based on Chetan's namesake novel. This will be the second time Arjun will be a part of an adaptation based on Bhagat's book. In 2014, he was seen in the film '2 States' an adaptation of the book '2 States: The Story of My Marriage'. MUST READ 
'Half Girlfriend' is expected to release on May 19 this year. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 18:52 More from zeenews
